relatedRecords.name: The Finding Ada Virtual STEM Conference
relatedRecords.description: For 2020, Ada Lovelace Day is going back to our roots with a day of blogging, Twittering and Facebooking, just like we did in 2009. #ALD20 will celebrate women, advocates and educators in STEM. We’ll be profiling women working in STEM around the world and those women who work so hard campaigning for…

relatedRecords.name: Open Source Community Conference(OSCONF) 2020 Pune
relatedRecords.description: OSCONF is a platform built to connect & bring all leading Meetup communities, Cloud native experts, Evangelists & DevOps together under one roof. It is a non-profit community event which allows you to interact with community leaders, ambassadors & open community contributors.

relatedRecords.name: DevDay
relatedRecords.description: Comunità spontanea di sviluppatori software nelle città di Napoli, Salerno, Avellino e Benevento. Sviluppiamo software per passione e ci incontriamo tutti i mesi per parlarne.
